title: stuff_you_want_to_add_to_your_Genymotion_image_Android4.4.4
description:
A complete package to help you make your free Genymotion more fun,
it does not include Genymotion crack or patch,

it does include many pro packages and everything you need to install Google-Apps (including Google services), so you could use your GMAIL and Google-Play store/market to download apps directly on your emulator.

in addition you can update the generic super-user to SuperSU which enables su at boot and other pro features (pro apk included),

Xposed Framework installer is too an open-source (nothing in this package is cracked/patched really)..

how to install:
Genymotion supports drag&drop of zip files which are "flashable", and regular drag&drop of apk which its then install and open.

easily enough drag&drop "1__Genymotion-ARM-Translation_v1.1.zip" following with "2__gapps-kk-20140105-signed.zip" following with "UPDATE-SuperSU-v2.46.zip", you can restart (close the emulator window, wait 5 seconds then and press the start icon in the Genymotion software window)

a bonus is the complete pandora & pandora patcher (xposed module) -suite to allow you use pandora unrestricted with country limitation, along with downloading MP3 of the current song playing, with unrestricted skips and never hear ads or popups, this is the last version where it actually worked that good, future versions includes small ads
